nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, this Zygerrian was working as a slaver in the Labor Processing Hub on Kadavo.

This Zygerrian slaver worked in the Labor Processing Hub during the time when High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi, Captain Rex and Togruta colonists of Kiros, Roshti were imprisoned there. This slaver whipped Obi-Wan with a shock whip for talking, which was prohibited, then started whipping Roshti as a punishment. When Obi-Wan told him that Roshti should not be punished for his own mistakes, a second slaver electrocuted him with a rod to his collar. This slaver then said that he does not take commands from a slave and started to whip the Togruta again until Obi-Wan begged him to stop, calling him his master and asking him for forgiveness.
